title: WTB - N135 Duke "Talk of the Diamond"
author: Bliggity

posts.post_title: WTB - N135 Duke "Talk of the Diamond"
posts.post_content: Looking to pick up a couple N135 Duke "Talk of the Diamond" cards.  Any cards from the set are ok.  Prefer raw VGish condition, but flexible.  Thanks!

There will be a few in my auction which opens tomorrow.

brockelmanauctions.com

Scott
